Package com.intellij.ui.tree

Interface TreePathBackgroundSupplier

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BreakpointsCheckboxTree, BreakpointsSimpleTree, ChangesBrowserBase.ChangesBrowserTreeList, ChangesListView, ChangesTree, ChangesTreeImpl, ChangesTreeImpl.Changes, ChangesTreeImpl.FilePaths, ChangesTreeImpl.VirtualFiles, ChangesTreeList, CheckboxTree, CheckboxTreeBase, CollectionTree, ColorOptionsTree, ComponentTree, ComponentTree, DebuggerTree, DebuggerTreeBase, DetectedFrameworksTree, DnDAwareTree, ExternalSystemTasksTree, FrameworksTree, InspectionTree, InstancesTree, JBTreeTable, JBTreeWithHintProvider, LayoutTree, PostfixTemplatesCheckboxTree, ProjectViewTree, SelectFilesDialog.VirtualFileList, SimpleDnDAwareTree, SimpleTree, SingleElementTree, SourceItemsTree, StructureTree, ThreadsDebuggerTree, Tree, Tree, TreeTableTree, VcsLogChangesBrowser.MyChangesTree, XDebuggerTree

    public interface TreePathBackgroundSupplier

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.Color getPathBackground(javax.swing.tree.TreePath path, int row)
      This method allows to specify a background for a specified tree node.

    • Method Detail

      • getPathBackground

        java.awt.Color getPathBackground(javax.swing.tree.TreePath path,
                                 int row)
        This method allows to specify a background for a specified tree node. Note, that this method is called from the Event Dispatch Thread during painting.
        Parameters:
        path - a path to a tree node in a tree
        row - a visible index of a tree node that allows to define old fashioned striped background
        Returns:
        a preferred background color or null if a tree node should use default background
